full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/23/2023 AFFIDAVIT OF MARRIAGE I Hazara Singh, after having been duly sworn, hereby depose and state that the following statements are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief: That I am currently residing at Beach, North Dakota 58621 ; That I was born on April 15, 1908, in Nadala, India, and I am a citizen of Canada ; That I personally know Mr. Jaswant Singh, citizen of India ; That Mr. Jaswant Singh was born on April 17, 1897, at Multan (Pakistan), That Mr. Jaswant Singh was married on April 13, 1917, at Lehna Singh Wala Pakistan , with Miss Beant Kaur, That during their marital life, they had two children; That Narinderjit Singh Keith is Mr. and Mrs. Jaswant Singh's son; That Narinderjit Singh Keith was born on August 1, 1930, at Lehna Singh. Wala, Pakistan , That I know the foregoing fact because I am cousio of Mr. Jaswant Singh ; That I have executed this affidavit to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge. Dated: July 20, 1988 Name Hegane first State of North Dakota County of Golden Valley Signature On this 20th day of July, 1988, personally appeared before me Hazara Singh Sarpal, known to me to be the person described in and who executed the within and foregoing instrument, and who personally acknowledged to me that he executed the same. Kathleen A. Nelson Notary Public, Golden Valley Co. , N.Dak. My Commission Expires - June 14, 1989
